Containers.Name: auto-dl-pyload-routine
Containers.Registry:
https://hub.docker.com/r/etiennestrobbe/auto-dl-manager-pyloadroutine/Registry> https://github.com/etiennestrobbe/AutoDLManager etiennestrobbe/auto-dl-manager-pyloadroutine:V1.0 true true
bridge
CONNECTION_STRING Host=IP;Port=5432;Database=AutoDLManager;Username=XXX;Password=XXX
REMOTE_SERVER_HTTP_URL http://url.com/download/
PYLOAD_IP 192.168.1.200
MAX_DOWNLOAD 25
PYLOAD_USER admin
PYLOAD_PASS password
REFRESH_VALUE 5000
https://github.com/etiennestrobbe/unraid-docker-templates/raw/master/icons/rtorrent-arch-linux.png
